CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Verify that CSS variables are defined correctly wrt DOM inheritance
matchedStyles.availableCSSVariables()
element.style
  --body-variable
  --another-div-variable
  --div-variable
  --span-variable
span
  --body-variable
  --another-div-variable
  --div-variable
  --span-variable
.myelement
  --body-variable
  --another-div-variable
  --div-variable
div
  --body-variable
  --another-div-variable
  --div-variable
